column5: What does it mean to be an American? Is there a shared American culture, or is that just something Europeans imagine?Because of the global reach of the United States, most Europeans have the impression that they "know" America, which is often perceived as a single culture, with little recognition of the complexity and variety that are characteristic of the nation.American Studies is a two year MA program that focuses on the world's leading superpower. It looks at culture, politics, economics, literature, and society in a country of more than 300 million inhabitants in fifty distinct states.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
